div.p: Step 1: Compute Precision-Recall Curve For each class, vary confidence threshold from 1.0 → 0.0 Plot Precision vs Recall at each threshold
Step 2: Compute AP (Average Precision) AP = Area Under the PR Curve (Typically using 11-point or all-point interpolation)
Step 3: Average Across Classes mAP = (AP_dog + AP_cat + AP_car + ...) / N_classes
Typical Scores (COCO mAP@0.5:0.95) • YOLOv5s: ~36 (fast, small) • YOLOv5x: ~50 (accurate, large) • YOLOv8x: ~53 (latest)
mAP@0.5:0.95 Average over IoU = 0.5, 0.55, ..., 0.95 (COCO style - stricter)
